page.title: 15ANDREW INGLIS (11) B/BRIGGS
page.content:
PERSONAL ACCOUNT 1985 HELLO! MY NAME IS{ANDREW INGLIS}AND I AM 11 YEARS OF AGE. I LIVE IN A SEMI-DETACHED HOUSE. IN OUR HOUSE THERE ARE THREE BEDROOMS, 1 KITCHEN, 1 BATHROOM AND A LOUNGE. IN OUR KITCHEN THERE IS A FRIDGE, A COOKER, A DISHWASHER, A SINK, AND A WASHING MACHINE. OUR HOUSE IS HEATED BY GAS.
THERE ARE 4 PEOPLE IN OUR{FAMILY.}MY WEE SISTER IS IN PRIMARY 4 AND I AM IN PRIMARY 7. MY DAD IS THE MANAGER OF THE TECHNICAL SERVICES DEPARTMENT IN THE BBC AND MY MUM IS A HEALTH VISITOR. WE HAVE ONE PET, A DOG CALLED LUCY.
MY MAIN{HOBBY}IS SWIMMING AND I AM A MEMBER OF THE SWIMMING CLUB AT BISHOPBRIGGS SPORTS CENTRE
